description:
More mud pie, please. These high-top trail shoes want nothing more than to get splattered in rain and mud. A moulded ankle collar and waterproof upper protecting your feet from weather and whatever slop sits on the trail. With an ultra-cushioned midsole, your knees will thank you when your day is done, plus, a gnarly tread gives you some much-needed traction on slick or slimy tracks. Cool colours, sure, but these definitely look best covered in mud.

  • Mid-cut design protects the ankle and provides extra support on rugged terrain
  • GORE-TEX® waterproof membrane keeps your feet dry from below
  • Oversized EVA midsole provides lightweight cushioning under each impact
  • Wide platform improves stability on the ground
  • Vibram® Megagrip 5mm lugs dig into the trail
  • Multi-directional grip improves traction in all directions
name: Hoka One One Speedgoat 5 Mid Gore-Tex Trail Running Shoes - Men's
